channel_black_level_r_tab.description: R/Gr/Gb/B channel black level. Increasing the value increases the black subtraction and increase the contrast.
channel_black_level_r_tab.conversion: Bitwidth conversion if pipeline bitwidth is not 14bit
channel_black_level_r_tab.additional_notes: 2-D black correction to replace the single black level. Black level in chromatix_linearization_type data should be set to zero. Use parameters from chromatix_black_level_type to adjust black for low light if needed. Use trigger and max_blk_increase to interpolate blk_increase, and add blk_increase to each node in LUTs
